structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Cost of proceeding -- Burden of proof.
law.text: The cost of the proceeding shall be borne by the complainant, and the burden of proof shall be upon the claimant to establish his interest and to establish that it has not been abandoned.
law.history: Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 5. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 5.
